algorithm_technique: Calculate time based on how many tickets each person buys before the target person finishes.
problem_summary_simple: Calculate the time for a specific person to buy all their tickets in a queue.
problem_summary_technical: Sum the tickets bought by each person: min(their tickets, target person's tickets) if before or at k, else target person's tickets - 1.
key_insights: The problem can be solved by directly calculating the time without simulating the queue.
People before or at index k will buy `min(their_tickets, tickets[k])` tickets.
People after index k will buy `tickets[k] - 1` tickets, as the k-th person will finish before them.
